articles.title: American Kevin Dawes sues Syria over alleged prison torture - NPR
articles.description: Kevin Dawes describes how a fellow prisoner in Syria kept a promise that called attention to Dawes' detention. Now, five years after his release, Dawes is suing the Syrian regime.

articles.title: America is facing a ballot-box coup – help us sound the alarm in 2022 - The Guardian
articles.description: All over the country, free and fair elections are under threat. This will be one of the most important stories we tell in 2022.
